LanguageData.Shittim_Chest.label: Shittim Chest
LanguageData.Shittim_Chest.description: A pad that contained the OS--Shittim Chest.You can use it to contact with Schale and recurit students from Kivotos.\n\nThis device is powered by radioactive battery, so it can be used without external power supply.
